DOC.criteria: 1 . Males female age 25 75 2 . If leukapheresis : Hepatitis B surface antigen negative tested* Hepatitis C antibody negative tested* HIV antibody negative tested* VDRL negative tested* No known IV drug user HgB > 8.5 WBC > 3,800 Platelets > 120,000 INR < 2 ( verify clinically indicate ) 3 .
